description: Tender chicken cooked in a fragrant tikka masala sauce and served with rice, this 15-minute Indian recipe will be a hit with the whole family.
keywords: Tikka masala,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Egg free,Low sugar,High protein,High fibre,Wheat free,Chicken,Dinner Made Easy
name: Quick Chicken Masala Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g The Spice Tailor original tikka masala
500g Woolworths RSPCA-approved chicken thigh fillets, cut into 4cm pieces
450g Sunrice basmati microwave rice, heated (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Add the spice sachet from the tikka masala packet. Cook for 30 seconds or until fragrant. Add the chicken. Cook, stirring, for 2 minutes or until browned.
Stir in the sauce base from the tikka masala packet. Cook for 1 minute or until combined.
Stir in the main sauce from the tikka masala packet and peas. Reduce heat to low. Simmer for 8 minutes or until chicken is cooked through.
Heat rice according to packet instructions. Spoon rice among serving bowls. Top with chicken masala and sprinkle with coriander. Serve.
